title: So guys, I'm being serious when I ask this: Is it bannable to say "kms"
body:
I say it every time I make a shitty play and it idk but seeing how anything can be turned against me I'm kinda scared that one of these days I might get reported for saying it. What do you guys think/know about saying kms in game and the consequences. I just feel that it makes me feel better because if I say kms after doing something stupid I feel that my team will know that I know I fucked up and they'll leave me alone.

INB4: suicide is not a joke yadayada. I know I'm just talking about this particular scenario where I don't encourage anyone to harm themselves but myself.
